## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description      | Type                              | Default  |
| ----------- | ------------ | ---------------- | --------------------------------- | -------- |
| `activeTab` | `active-tab` | Active tab index | `number`                          | `0`      |
| `variant`   | `variant`    | Visual variant   | `"enclosed" \| "line" \| "pills"` | `'line'` |


## Events

| Event         | Description | Type                  |
| ------------- | ----------- | --------------------- |
